- |snippet_verify_license|.
- |tbc|
- |snippet_install| |mingw-w64|.
- |update-installation-instructions| for |mingw-w64|.
- Update the |mingw-w64| entry in
  ``conf/env/paths_win32.txt`` and
  ``conf/env/paths_linux.txt``
- |snippet_update_license| in
  ``docs/general/license-tables/external/license-info_mingw-w64.csv``.
- |snippet_changelog_entry|
- |snippet_commit|
  ``Dependency update: <XXXX>/Q<Y>: mingw-w64 <version number>``.
